title: Man United deliver huge blow to Man City title hopes with shock derby win
raw_text: Manchester City's title bid is as good as over after Manchester United won the midfield battle at Old Trafford.

title: VAR review: Should Man United's Dalot have received a red card for foul on Doku?
raw_text: Diogo Dalot saw yellow for catching Jérémy Doku on the knee. The VAR agreed, but was it the right call?

title: Carrick challenges Utd after derby: Let's keep it up
raw_text: Michael Carrick has challenged his Manchester United players to keep it up after stunning Manchester City in his first game in charge.

title: Arsenal held by Forest, go 7 points clear of City
raw_text: Arsenal missed the chance to go nine points clear at the top of the Premier League after being held to a 0-0 draw by Nottingham Forest on Saturday.

title: Sources: Guéhi set for City medical in $27M deal
raw_text: Marc Guéhi is set to have a medical on Sunday ahead of his proposed move to Manchester City, sources have told ESPN.

title: Slot 'understands' Liverpool fans' boos after draw
raw_text: Arne Slot said he "completely understands" the frustration of the Liverpool fans who booed the team following Saturday's 1-1 draw with Burnley in the Premier League.

title: Wrexham captain McClean exits, joins Derry City
raw_text: Wrexham have announced that their club captain James McLean has moved to Derry City.

title: Kane scores, Musiala returns as Bayern hit 5
raw_text: Just when it seemed RB Leipzig might be the team to inflict Bayern Munich 's first Bundesliga loss this season, Bayern found an extra gear.

title: Salah, Marmoush PK misses hand Nigeria bronze
raw_text: Egypt stars Mohamed Salah and Omar Marmoush both saw their penalties saved by Nigeria goalkeeper Stanley Nwabali in a shootout to allow the Super Eagles to claim Africa Cup of Nations bronze.

title: Fiorentina's U.S. owner Commisso dies at 76
raw_text: Rocco Commisso, the outspoken owner of Italian soccer club Fiorentina and chairman of New York-based Mediacom Communications, has died. He was 76.

title: ↔️ Premier League's top 50 transfers of all time
raw_text: What makes a great signing? Is it trophies won, goals scored, a long run of dominance ... or all of the above? Bill Connelly breaks down the best 50 Premier League moves since it began in 1992-93.

title: Margin for error quickly vanishing for this uninspiring Liverpool side
raw_text: A draw at home vs. Burnley is the latest disappointment for Liverpool as their dramatic fall from last season continues.

title: Ranking the USMNT's top 15 prospects age 21 or younger, from Europe to MLS
raw_text: As the USMNT's 2026 begins, we rank the U21 American players on the national team radar. From Europe to MLS, here's the top 15.
